title: Secret Settings On My Boyfriend’s Phone
description:
Lauren reveals what she unexpectedly finds on Jeremy’s phone after a not-so-accidental lurk. They discuss the boundaries around snooping through your partner’s phone and celebrate the 1 year birthday of Wild ’Til 9.

Go to Canva.me/wild to get your FREE 45-day extended trial. 
As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/wt9
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
